<script>
// Filtros por categoría
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const filterButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.blog-filter-btn');
  const blogEntries = document.querySelectorAll('.blog-entry');
  
  // Obtener categoría de la URL si existe
  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const categoryFromUrl = urlParams.get('categoria');
  
  // Si hay categoría en la URL, activarla
  if (categoryFromUrl) {
    filterButtons.forEach(btn => {
      btn.classList.remove('active');
      if (btn.getAttribute('data-category') === categoryFromUrl) {
        btn.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
  
  filterButtons.forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('click', function() {
      const category = this.getAttribute('data-category');
      
      // Actualizar botones activos
      filterButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
      this.classList.add('active');
      
      // Actualizar URL sin recargar
      if (category === 'all') {
        window.history.pushState({}, '', 'blog.html');
      } else {
        window.history.pushState({}, '', 'blog.html?categoria=' + encodeURIComponent(category));
      }
      
      // Filtrar entradas
      blogEntries.forEach(entry => {
        if (category === 'all') {
          entry.style.display = '';
        } else {
          const categories = entry.getAttribute('data-categories');
          if (categories && categories.includes(category)) {
            entry.style.display = '';
          } else {
            entry.style.display = 'none';
          }
        }
      });
    });
  });
  
  // Aplicar filtro inicial si hay categoría en la URL
  if (categoryFromUrl && categoryFromUrl !== 'all') {
    blogEntries.forEach(entry => {
      const categories = entry.getAttribute('data-categories');
      if (categories && categories.includes(categoryFromUrl)) {
        entry.style.display = '';
      } else {
        entry.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
  }
});
</script>
